test_description: This test covers topics related to the Presentation and Application layers, including data compression, encryption, and standard application protocols like HTTP, FTP, and DNS.

questions.question: What is the primary function of the Presentation layer?
questions.options_b: To translate, compress, and encrypt data

questions.question: Which of the following is a lossless compression technique?
What is the main purpose of the Application layer?
questions.options_a: To provide network services directly to user applications

questions.question: Which protocol is used to transfer files between computers?
What is the purpose of DNS (Domain Name System)?
questions.options_a: To translate domain names to IP addresses

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of HTTP?
What is the main difference between lossy and lossless compression?
questions.options_a: Lossy compression allows perfect reconstruction of the original data
questions.options_b: Lossless compression allows perfect reconstruction of the original data
questions.options_c: Lossy compression is only used for text
questions.options_d: Lossless compression always results in smaller files than lossy compression

questions.question: Which protocol is used to send email messages?
What is the purpose of the JPEG image compression standard?
questions.options_a: To provide lossless compression for images
questions.options_b: To provide lossy compression for images

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an application layer protocol?
What is the purpose of SNMP (Simple Network Management Protocol)?
questions.options_d: To translate domain names to IP addresses

questions.question: Which compression technique replaces frequently occurring strings with references to a dictionary?
What is the default port number for HTTP?
Which protocol is used for secure HTTP communication?
What is the purpose of run-length encoding (RLE)?
questions.options_a: To replace sequences of the same data values with a count and a single value
questions.options_b: To create a frequency-based code for each symbol
questions.options_c: To build a dictionary of frequently occurring strings
questions.options_d: To encrypt data for secure transmission

questions.question: Which protocol is used to retrieve email messages from a server?
What is the purpose of the GIF image format?
questions.options_b: For simple graphics with limited colors

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of the Presentation layer?
questions.options_b: Handles data translation, compression, and encryption

questions.question: What is the purpose of Huffman coding?
questions.options_a: To create an optimal prefix code based on character frequencies
questions.options_b: To replace repeated strings with references
questions.options_c: To count runs of identical data
questions.options_d: To encrypt data for secure transmission

questions.question: Which protocol is used to synchronize clocks on network devices?
